articles.title: Zika virus detected in India's Kerala state - TODAYonline
articles.description: NEW DELHI — Authorities in India's southern Kerala region have issued a statewide alert after a case of the Zika virus was confirmed, officials said Friday (July 9).

articles.title: Top experts slam COVID-19 lab leak theory, call for scientific study - CGTN
articles.description: Dozens of top experts worldwide have refuted the claims that the novel coronavirus escaped from the Wuhan Institute of Virology (WIV), but reiterated that SARS-CoV-2 most likely originated in nature.
